cause.description:
Help raise Awareness!
Inflammatory Breast Cancer, is a rare but very aggressive type of breast cancer. IBC usually grows rapidly and often spreads to other parts of the body.
To learn more about IBC, other types of breast cancer, and breast health in general, please refer to the following resources:
NCI’s Breast Cancer Home Page (http://www.cancer.gov/breast/) Breast Cancer (PDQ®): Treatment (http://www.cancer.gov/cancertopics/pdq/treatment/breast/patient/) Understanding Breast Changes: A Health Guide for All Women (http://www.cancer.gov/cancertopics/understanding-breast-changes) What You Need To Know About™ Breast Cancer (http://www.cancer.gov/cancertopics/wyntk/breast)
all info was found on: cancer.gov
1. More awareness should be raised about IBC
cause.name: Inflammatory Breast Cancer
